name: Duststorm
body_text: All players put their hands face down when this card is played.
While this card is in play, all hands remain facedown unless a rule of this card allows the player to view them. Any cards drawn during this phase must be placed facedown.
Upkeep phase: You may pick up 1d6 cards.
Resolution phase: You must put all but 1d4 cards face down.
